ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: and( not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "API" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "Admin" ), text( SBU__c ) = "D&S", Win_Only_Opportunity__c == true, ISPICKVAL (StageName, 'Closed Won'), or( ATR_Probability__c <> 1, Program_Go_Probability__c <> 1 ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Probability must be set to 100% for the Closed Won opportunity.
